level.heading: PRIMARY CONTRACTOR FOR CONVENTION EVENTS AT THE CONVENTION CENTER (§ 19-401)

level.text: 401.1 The Washington, DC Convention and Tourism Corporation t/a Destination DC“Destination DC”) shall be the Authority’s primary contractor for bookingonvention events at the Convention Center.
401.2 As the Authority’s primary contractor for convention events at theonvention Center, Destination DC shall negotiate tentative arrangements withustomers, including the following:
Committing of specific areas in the Convention Center; and

401.3 Destination DC shall not assign or reserve areas of the Convention Centeresignated for retail sales or areas designated as common spaces (other thanegistration areas specified by the Authority).

401.4 Destination DC shall include in each letter of intent, confirmationetter or agreement negotiated with a customer for space in the Conventionenter, a clause in bold type in a prominent location stating the following:
All terms herein are contingent upon the written approval of the Washingtononvention and Sports Authority.
